price: Baravuga bati “Nta cyo bitwaye! Mu by’ukuri tuzasubira kwa Nyagasani wacu.”
arabic: قَالُواْ لَا ضَيۡرَۖ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا مُنقَلِبُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qālū lā ḍayra innā ilā rabbinā munqalibūna
